titleStmt.title: The deploratioun of the cruel murther of James Erle of Murray, vmquhile regent of Scotland togidder with ane admonitioun to the Hammiltounis committaris thairof, aud [sic] to all thair fortifearis, mante naris [sic], or assistance, with ane exhortatioun to the lordis and nobilitie, keiparis and defendaris of our kingis grace maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

titleStmt.title: The deploratioun of the cruel murther of James Erle of Murray, vmquhile regent of Scotland togidder with ane admonitioun to the Hammiltounis committaris thairof, aud [sic] to all thair fortifearis, mante naris [sic], or assistance, with ane exhortatioun to the lordis and nobilitie, keiparis and defendaris of our kingis grace maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Sempill by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
